languages.text: "Ее жертва ужасна... Но я не могу испытывать к ней ничего, кроме устрашенного почтения".
"The sacrifice she made was terrible... And yet, as astounded as I am, I have nothing but respect for her."
languages.original_text: "Ее жертва ужасна... Но я не могу испытывать к ней ничего, кроме устрашенного почтения".

traits.locale_text: "The sacrifice she made was terrible... and yet, as astounded as I am, I have nothing but respect for her."
"The sacrifice she made was terrible... and yet, as astounded as I am, I have nothing but respect for her."
"The sacrifice she made was terrible... And yet, as astounded as I am, I have nothing but respect for her."

"The sacrifice she made was terrible... And yet, as astounded as I am, I have nothing but respect for her."
"The sacrifice she made was terrible... And yet, as astounded as I am, I have nothing but respect for her."

languages.text: "Sie hat ein schreckliches Opfer erbracht ... Und doch, so erstaunt ich auch bin, empfinde ich nichts als Respekt für sie."
languages.original_text: "The sacrifice she made was terrible... And yet, as astounded as I am, I have nothing but respect for her."

traits.locale_text: "Sie hat ein schreckliches Opfer erbracht ... Und doch, so erstaunt ich auch bin, empfinde ich nichts als Respekt für sie."

languages.text: « Le sacrifice qu'elle a fait était immense... Pour autant, aussi surprenant que cela puisse paraître, elle ne m'inspire guère que du respect. »
languages.original_text: "The sacrifice she made was terrible... And yet, as astounded as I am, I have nothing but respect for her."

traits.locale_text: « Le sacrifice qu'elle a fait était immense... Pour autant, aussi surprenant que cela puisse paraître, elle ne m'inspire guère que du respect. »

languages.text: «Su sacrificio ha sido terrible... pero, por asombrada que esté, solo puedo expresar mi respeto por ella».
languages.original_text: "The sacrifice she made was terrible... And yet, as astounded as I am, I have nothing but respect for her."

traits.locale_text: «Su sacrificio ha sido terrible... pero, por asombrada que esté, solo puedo expresar mi respeto por ella».

languages.text: 「彼女の犠牲は酷かった…。私も驚いているけど、彼女のことは尊敬しているわ」
languages.original_text: "The sacrifice she made was terrible... And yet, as astounded as I am, I have nothing but respect for her."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女の犠牲は酷かった…。私も驚いているけど、彼女のことは尊敬しているわ」

languages.text: “她付出的牺牲实在是太可怕了……不过，尽管我震惊不已，但我心里对她只有敬意。”
languages.original_text: "The sacrifice she made was terrible... And yet, as astounded as I am, I have nothing but respect for her."

traits.locale_text: “她付出的牺牲实在是太可怕了……不过，尽管我震惊不已，但我心里对她只有敬意。”

languages.original_text: "The sacrifice she made was terrible... And yet, as astounded as I am, I have nothing but respect for her."

languages.text: "Fedakârlığı korkunçtu... Ancak her ne kadar şaşkınlık içinde olsam da ona yalnızca hürmet duyuyorum."
languages.original_text: "The sacrifice she made was terrible... And yet, as astounded as I am, I have nothing but respect for her."
